doc: The pathname to the initial force field.
The format of the initial force field file. Currently known formats: 'FFFILETNKFORMAT' (Tinker format).
Pathname to the molecular structure file (SDF) defining the systems for which a force field is generated from the vibrational analysis.
Pathname to the vibrational analysis files (VibModule) providing force constants for the analyzed systems.

Lines defining which force field energy terms are to be extracted from VibModule analysis. Each line defines a tuple (up to 4 strings) of SMARTS followed by a keyword defining the type of energy term among 'STR' (stretching), 'BND' (bending), 'OOP' (out-of-plane bending), and 'TOR' (torsion).

Lines defining the relation between single-atom SMARTS queries and atom types/classes. The syntax of each line must be: <String> type=<int> [class=<int>], where the first string is the SMARTS query, and the following integers define the atom type and, optionally, the class of the atom type.
The pathname to the file where to print the new force field.
Sets the amount of log messages. Larger values result in more detailed log reports.
